name: EverReflect
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: EverReflect is a hyper reflection utility token with tax reduction & delayed dev burn. EVRF holders will earn a 15% Reward in Binance-Peg (BUSD) reflections for every BUY/SELL (Min. 1,000,000 Tokens)
